GbeEventInfo Struct Reference

#include <gbe.h>

Data Fields

   struct {
      uint32_t   port
   }   discovery

      uint16_t   blockId

      uint16_t   streamChannelIndex
      uint64_t   timestamp
   }   gevevent

uint16_t type

Detailed Description

data structure for events received from the board and camera callback functions

Field Documentation

uint16_t GbeEventInfo::blockId

the block id field from the GigE Vision Event network packet (GBE_EVENT_GEVEVENT)

union { ... } GbeEventInfo::data

event data

const uint8_t* GbeEventInfo::data

uint32_t GbeEventInfo::port

the port where the camera environment has changed (GBE_EVENT_DISCOVERY_CHANGE)
